content:
Prev: Chandler loses the ball to a Fire Eagle Up: Heartbreakers vs Fire Eagles Next: Orange Squirt

Walden, Beth, and Miles at halftime



Miles wanted to be a linesman like his dad; he carried the flag onto the field and waved it around for a while before being brought back by another Heartbreaker
Taken Saturday, September 21, 2002, 10:29:40am.  Original image size: 3072x2048, 2.1Mb
Technical details: Canon EOS D60, 1/800s @ F4.0, ISO 200, 70-200mm/F2.8+1.4x @ 125mm (200mm equiv)
PS6 Crop, Curves 0:0 - 20:25 - 70:90 - 255:255, USM 150:0.5, D60ISOR 400 low
